name: Henri Louveau
introduction: Henri Louveau (born 25 January 1910 and died 7 January 1991) was a French Formula One driver who participated in 48 non-championship races between 1946 and 1951. He also participated in the 1950 Italian Grand Prix and 1951 Swiss Grand Prix driving a Talbot-Lago car for Ecurie Rosier.
